plan_security_measures.title: Defensive Planning
plan_security_measures.description: The traders' faces grow serious as they consider threats: 'The Cartel won't let us organize without retaliation,' one warns. 'We'll need security for our facilities, protection for our families, and contingency plans if they try to destroy us through sabotage or intimidation.'

choices.text: 'We should coordinate with infrastructure security teams.'
'Maybe we need to reconsider direct confrontation.'
'This is getting dangerous. I need to coordinate with other crisis teams.'
